messages.message: Is it true that our Google OCR does not follow the right spec for word polys? Provenance tracking will sometimes fail because it does not contain fields such as confidence and unsure
@Jonathan Shih does Google OCR produce the right confidence tracking information? I don’t quite remember if it fills in all those details
i feel like it does have some confidence values, but maybe it’s getting lost somewhere along the way
maybe it’s a task that Warren can help fill in @Jonathan Shih as a quick starter task if you know what to fix?
let me take a quick look and scope it

@dlluncor @Aaron Vontell btw, google returns confidence values per word and does not have a concept of “unsure”. Not entirely sure how these confidence values are used, but should we just have each letter of a word share the same confidence value and have the “unsure” field be a thresholding on the google confidence value?
yes the unsure concept is whether this particular character should be flagged or not, and hence, whether all the characters which show up in the extraction should be flagged
